thematic.title: Education & Literacy
thematic.desc: Empowering individuals through quality education, learning programs, and access to resources for lifelong learning.

thematic.title: Health & Nutrition
thematic.desc: Promoting healthier communities by ensuring access to essential health services, nutrition, and awareness.

thematic.title: Livelihood & Skill Development
thematic.desc: Supporting sustainable incomes through skill-building, vocational training, and entrepreneurship.

thematic.title: Environment & Climate Action
thematic.desc: Fostering eco-friendly practices, conservation, and community-based climate resilience efforts.

thematic.title: Gender Equality & Social Inclusion
thematic.desc: Advancing equity by empowering marginalized groups and promoting inclusive participation in society.

thematic.title: Good Governance & Civic Engagement
thematic.desc: Encouraging transparent governance, civic rights education, and active citizen participation.
